title: Your Inspiration At Home Announces Auto-Ship Spice Program, The Flavour Stack™
text:
Content preferences Done 
DALLAS, Aug. 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- An innovative new auto-ship program for spices called The Flavour Stack ™ will launch worldwide next month and was unveiled at Your Inspiration At Home's annual convention in Gold Coast Australia. Your Inspiration At Home CEO Colleen Walters made the announcement. View photo . 
The Flavour Stack delivers packs of pre-arranged "pods" and recipe cards directly to customers' homes every month. The plastic pods contain the exact portion of Your Inspiration At Home spices, dukkah, or infused extra virgin olive oils needed to make the included recipes. Pods are stacked and boxed in groups of three, with multiple stacks included in each package. 
Recipes used in The Flavour Stack come from Your Inspiration At Home Independent Sales Consultants, and are uncomplicated, easy-to-make meals designed for at-home cooks. Each stack makes a meal for at least four people. Recipe cards include an easy tear-off grocery list. 
" The Flavour Stack is a great fit for anyone who wants to cook delicious and healthy meals without having to buy large quantities of ingredients. You simply choose the stacks you want, pick up the produce and protein, and we supply the flavour," says Walters. 
New stacks will be added to the program each month, and customers will be able to choose specific stacks or receive a pre-selected "stack of the month." Stacks will include many of the award-winning offerings from Your Inspiration At Home's hand-crafted product line. 
Some stacks will be tailor-made for "freezer meal parties," at which Your Inspiration At Home Consultants help customers make meals that are taken home in coolers and frozen for later consumption. 
"This program is a fun and convenient way to sample a wide range of our newest and most popular flavours," says Walters. "When customers are ready to order larger quantities of their favorite products, they'll already know exactly how to use them." About Your Inspiration At Home 
Your Inspiration At Home ( www.yourinspirationathome.com.au ) is an award-winning maker of hand-crafted spices and other gourmet food items from around the world. Independent Your Inspiration At Home Consultants sell directly to customers around the world, in markets including Australia, New Zealand, the United States and Canada. The company has won more than 200 gourmet food awards in competitions over the past three years. It is part of the CVSL Inc. family of brands. About CVSL Inc. 
CVSL Inc. [NYSE MKT: CVSL] is a growing platform of direct-to-consumer brands. Within CVSL, each company retains its own separate brand identity, sales force and compensation plan. CVSL companies currently include The Longaberger Company , a 42-year old maker of hand-crafted baskets and other home decor items; Your Inspiration At Home , an award-winning maker of hand-crafted spices and other gourmet food items from around the world; Tomboy Tools , a direct seller of tools designed for women as well as home security systems; Agel Enterprises , a global seller of nutritional products in gel form as well as a skin care line, operating in 40 countries; Paperly , which offers a line of custom stationery and other personalized products; My Secret Kitchen , a U.K.-based seller of gourmet food products; Uppercase Living , which offers an extensive line of customizable vinyl expressions for display on walls in the home; and Kleeneze , a UK-based seller of cleaning, health, beauty, home, outdoor and a variety of other products.
